metadata.title: CVE-2014-6396 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The dissector_postgresql function in dissectors/ec_postgresql.c in Ettercapbefore 0.8.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service andpossibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted password length, whichtriggers a 0 character to be written to an arbitrary memory location.

criterions.comment: ettercap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
